item.title: Hunting animals with dogs
item.summary: Hunting the 'LÃ¶ffelhund' (Proteles) and Jackal. (L II.-1. 217 and 218.) The man hunts various animals with a dog. The dog catches and bites the animals, after which the man beats them to death with a stick.
item.comments: 1) Note on the inside of the back cover of this notebook: 'Finished correcting Sept 15/71 from Jantje Toorm himself', 2) This story is found in Book II-1
item.author: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
